description: . 31st, 3BR, 830, My room - in a 3-bedroom apartment - is available for rent in PORTER SQUARE from June 1st to Aug 31st (with possibility of renewal next year as I am moving out of Boston).The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood right across from Porter Square (Red Line access,  grocery shopping (Star Market),  CVS,  Walgreens,  Dunkin Donuts,  Porter Square Books,  Panera,  and a bunch of bars & restaurants,  including one of my favorite : Christopher's)YOUR ROOM: Bright and sunny with enormous windows and a large closet. The room will be fully furnished and fits a full bed,  nightstand,  dresser,  study table and chair,  and a bookcase with plenty of space for additional pieces.THE APARTMENT:- Utilities (electric & heat) plus internet is about $40 in the summer per roommate- 1 bathroom- Large,  eat-in kitchen with dishwasher- Coin-op laundry in basement- The apartment is heated with vents and is controlled by a thermostat- Hardwood floors throughout- Easy access to the Red line and 77,  83,  87,  and 96 bus lines- No smoking or drugsAbout your future roommates:- One roommate is a female,  twenty-something public accountant,  but despite the desk job,  loves spending time outside exploring the city,  playing soccer,  and pretending to know about wine. In the summer,  free time is mostly spent at the beach.- The other roommate is a 26 y/o girl who loves craft beer (specifically Ommegang),  the Bills,  and Ireland. Still exploring Boston,  and loves to try new places in other neighborhoods. Excited to meet someone who likes to hang out and have fun around the town,  or chill in the apartment with a beverage and a good movie.About you:23 years+ Graduate student or professional with a steady income and a sense of humor. Keeps common spaces clean and pays bills on time. Both my roommates are very friendly and we hang out together pretty often but also respect each other's privacy.Please reply via e-mail so we can talk further. Give us a brief description (job,  hobbies,  ideal living environment...) so we can know more about you :)I hope to hear from you soon!Nina

description: 1 Bedroom apt July 1st (South End), 1BR, 3354, I am subletting my 1 bedroom 720 square foot apartment starting July 1,  2016. I am happy to allow you to move in a few days early. My wife and I are moving due to medical residency and have 1 extra month on our lease. The apartment lease can be extended for as long as you want. You can discuss with the building owner prior to committing to sublet.About the building: in the Ink Block building. Building is above the brand new Whole Foods with direct elevator access to the grocery store. The doorman building has an rooftop outdoor pool,  grills,  outdoor TV,  and outdoor green space. Perfect for entertaining. The building also has multiple indoor spaces to host parties,  study,  watch tv,  etc. all free to use or free to reserve. There is a state of the art gym and fitness studio also free to residents. There is glassed in underground bike storage free for use. Parking is available but costs extra.About the Apartment: the apartment is roughly 720 square feet,  brand new,  we are the first tenants and have only lived here for 1 year. 1 bedroom,  floor to ceiling windows,  Central AC,  in unit washer and dryer,  wood floors,  mable counters,  stainless steel appliances. Great walk in closet tons of space,  also large coat closet in main area. The bathroom is huge and modern and can be accessed from bedroom or living room.The rent is $3354. This includes most everything. There is a water bill and electric bill which has roughly come to $50 per month total.See pictures,  it is truly an amazing apartment and building. 5th floor,  great backbay views. We will be sad to leave. Please email me with questions or if you would like a tour.As I said,  you would be taking over the last month of our lease and can extend the lease as long or short as you would like. No fees. Great for medical residents or employees of Tufts or BMC because of location. But also great overall location in the south end of boston.-Dave
